message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its incredible value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $700,000.
Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget, however, my original price reflects the true value of this product. I can adjust slightly to $900,000, but I can't go any lower.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to adjust your price. However, I am still seeking to keep the cost below $800,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $780,000.
